name: Cage Rage
description:
Cage Rage is a 2D platformer created for LiU's Fall Game Jam 2022.

The theme we chose to work on was "Roman Cages".

As a player you take the role of a poor prisoner in Ancient Rome. You must compete in the horrible games to amuse the folks at the Colloseum. Will you make it through the dreadful parcours? Or will you only fulfill the audience's lust for blood?

Controls:

Playable with gamepads. Charge your jump with right trigger button. Steer with left joystick.

Credits:

- David Weddfelt (https://david-weddfelt.itch.io/)

- Oliver Stromann (https://le-olleaux.itch.io/)
